import React, { useContext } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Login from "./Login" import { StateContext } from "../stateContext" function Header(props) { const { login, logout, userState } = useContext(StateContext) const token = localStorage.getItem("token") console.log(token) return (
